-- 查找 材料照片, 通过城市ID 与 科目树ID 或 照片类型 --材料相关照片(类型 1~8) ;WITH LLL AS ( --规格级（效果图，细节图，自定义） SELECT tsp_ID,tsp_TreeFour,tsp_TSID,tsp_Class,tsp_Type ,tsp_PhotoURL,tsp_BrandID,tsp_ParaID,tsp_Mian,tsp_Title,tsp_Content1,tsp_Content2 ,tsp_createTime,tsp_MatLevel,tsp_CityID FROM V_TreeStandardPhoto WHERE tsp_TreeFour= #{treeFourID} AND tsp_MatLevel=0 AND tsp_CityID=0 AND tsp_jincheng=0 AND tsp_Class=1 UNION ALL --规格级地区级（对比图） SELECT tsp_ID,tsp_TreeFour,tsp_TSID,tsp_Class,tsp_Type ,tsp_PhotoURL,tsp_BrandID,tsp_ParaID,tsp_Mian,tsp_Title,tsp_Content1,tsp_Content2 ,tsp_createTime,tsp_MatLevel,tsp_CityID FROM V_TreeStandardPhoto WHERE tsp_TreeFour= #{treeFourID} AND tsp_CityID= #{cityID} AND tsp_jincheng=0 AND tsp_Class=1 AND tsp_Type=3 UNION ALL --档次级（主图） SELECT tsp_ID,tsp_TreeFour,tsp_TSID,tsp_Class,tsp_Type ,tsp_PhotoURL,tsp_BrandID,tsp_ParaID,tsp_Mian,tsp_Title,tsp_Content1,tsp_Content2 ,tsp_createTime,tsp_MatLevel,tsp_CityID FROM V_TreeStandardPhoto WHERE tsp_TreeFour= #{treeFourID} AND tsp_CityID=0 AND tsp_MatLevel>=1 AND tsp_jincheng=0 AND tsp_Class=1 AND tsp_Type BETWEEN 1 AND 8 UNION ALL --子库照片（品牌LOGO，型号图） SELECT tsp_ID,tsp_TreeFour,tsp_TSID,tsp_Class,tsp_Type ,tsp_PhotoURL,tsp_BrandID,tsp_ParaID,tsp_Mian,tsp_Title,tsp_Content1,tsp_Content2 ,tsp_createTime,tsp_MatLevel,tsp_CityID FROM V_TreeStandardPhoto INNER JOIN V_Material ON m_ID=tsp_TSID WHERE tsp_TreeFour=#{treeFourID} AND m_CityID= #{cityID} AND tsp_jincheng=0 AND tsp_Class=2 AND tsp_MatLevel>=1) SELECT LLL.* FROM LLL
